```{r Inter-rater reliability and percent agreement}
library(psych)
library(dplyr)
library(parameters)
library(irr)
library(checkpoint)
library(osfr)
set.seed(874354)

# if problems with replication of the analysis would occur, uncheck the following line: 
#checkpoint(snapshotDate = "2020-09-18", R.version = "4.0.1")

# loading of data
excel.to.check = openxlsx::read.xlsx(choose.files())

# percent ageement
agree(excel.to.check, tolerance=0) 

# cohens kappa
kappa2(ratings = excel.to.check) # cohens kappa yields contraceptive values, thus other method i.e. Matthews correlation coefficient was used for the analysis of agreement. 

# Matthews correlation coefficient (dodat zdůvodnění proč zrovna toto)
mltools::mcc(excel.to.check$PM, excel.to.check$JH) %>% round(digits = 2) 
```
